imdb.plot outline: A young man is accidentally transported back to the Tang Dynasty and finds himself surrounded by beautiful women of the era. Taking advantage of the situation, the young man begins to "invent" perfume, the game of soccer, and other futuristic contraptions that make him very popular in his new surroundings. Will he decide that living in the past is better than his present life? "Man Comes to Tang Dynasty" is the first Chinese historical Web drama series.
imdb.title: Man comes to Tang dynasty
